mapper.select: SELECT b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS out_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 2 THEN t.trsc_amt ELSE 0 END) AS total_out, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS in_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 1 THEN t.trsc_amt ELSE 0 END) AS total_in, a.agmt_amt AS loan_limit, a.bal AS bal, a.real_amt AS real_amt FROM account a JOIN bank_code b ON a.bank_cd = b.bank_cd JOIN user_account ua ON a.acct_no = ua.acct_no AND a.bank_cd = ua.bank_cd LEFT JOIN inout_today t ON a.acct_no = t.acct_no WHERE ua.user_no = #{userNo} and acct_dv = '01' GROUP BY b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.bal, a.real_amt;

SELECT b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.expi_dt, a.cont_rt, a.bal FROM account a JOIN bank_code b ON a.bank_cd = b.bank_cd JOIN user_account u ON a.acct_no = u.acct_no AND a.bank_cd = u.bank_cd WHERE a.acct_dv = '02' AND u.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.expi_dt, a.cont_rt, a.bal;

SELECT b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.bal, a.new_dt, a.expi_dt, a.loan_kind FROM account a JOIN bank_code b ON a.bank_cd = b.bank_cd JOIN user_account u ON a.acct_no = u.acct_no AND a.bank_cd = u.bank_cd WHERE a.acct_dv = '03' AND u.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.bal, a.new_dt, a.expi_dt, a.loan_kind;

SELECT b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS out_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 2 THEN t.trsc_amt ELSE 0 END) AS total_out, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS in_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN t.inout_dv = 1 THEN t.trsc_amt ELSE 0 END) AS total_in, a.agmt_amt AS loan_limit, a.bal AS bal, a.real_amt AS real_amt FROM account a JOIN bank_code b ON a.bank_cd = b.bank_cd LEFT JOIN inout_today t ON a.acct_no = t.acct_no where acct_dv = '01' GROUP BY b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.bal, a.real_amt;

SELECT b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.expi_dt, a.pyat_amt, a.bal FROM account a JOIN bank_code b ON a.bank_cd = b.bank_cd WHERE a.acct_dv = '02' GROUP BY b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.expi_dt, a.cont_rt, a.bal;

SELECT b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.bal, a.new_dt, a.expi_dt, a.loan_kind FROM account a JOIN bank_code b ON a.bank_cd = b.bank_cd WHERE a.acct_dv = '03' GROUP BY b.bank_nm, a.acct_no, a.acct_nick_nm, a.loan_nm, a.agmt_amt, a.bal, a.new_dt, a.expi_dt, a.loan_kind;
